answers.author: Jeffrey Naftal
answers.text:
I would check with Jim Buschman at the City of Hallandale Beach where I used to work.  He is the risk manager there and has set up for many years an excellent program including safety and accident review committees.  Tell him I gave you his name.

author: Susan Thorpe
text: The City of Peoria AZ is interested in establishing a citywide accident/incident review program to enhance safety and employee accountability. I would like to get copies of other organizations' policies and procedures, whether you have  a review committee and if so who serves on it, how it works, etc.  Thanks for your help.
title: Employee Accident/Incident Review committee and process
